service: SageMaker Edge Manager dataplane service for communicating with active agents.

operations.GetDeployments: Use to get the active deployments from a device.
operations.GetDeviceRegistration: Use to check if a device is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.
operations.SendHeartbeat: Use to get the current status of devices registered on SageMaker Edge Manager.

refs.GetDeviceRegistrationResult$CacheTTL: The amount of time, in seconds, that the registration status is stored on the deviceâ€™s cache before it is refreshed.

Checksum.base: Information about the checksum of a model deployed on a device.

refs.DeploymentResult$DeploymentModels: Returns a list of models deployed on the agent.

DeploymentResult.base: Information about the result of a deployment on an edge device that is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

refs.SendHeartbeatRequest$DeploymentResult: Returns the result of a deployment on the device.

refs.DeploymentModel$Status: Returns the deployment status of the model.

refs.GetDeploymentsRequest$DeviceFleetName: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.
refs.GetDeviceRegistrationRequest$DeviceFleet: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.
refs.SendHeartbeatRequest$DeviceFleetName: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.

refs.GetDeploymentsRequest$DeviceName: The unique name of the device you want to get the configuration of active deployments from.
refs.GetDeviceRegistrationRequest$DeviceName: The unique name of the device you want to get the registration status from.

refs.GetDeviceRegistrationResult$DeviceRegist: Describes if the device is currently registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

EdgeDeployment.base: Information about a deployment on an edge device that is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

refs.GetDeploymentsResult$Deployments: Returns a list of the configurations of the active deployments on the device.

refs.SendHeartbeatRequest$AgentMetrics: For internal use. Returns a list of SageMaker Edge Manager agent operating metrics.

refs.DeploymentResult$DeploymentName: The name and unique ID of the deployment.
refs.EdgeDeployment$DeploymentName: The name and unique ID of the deployment.

refs.EdgeDeployment$FailureHandlingPolicy: Determines whether to rollback to previous configuration if deployment fails.

InternalServiceException.base: An internal failure occurred. Try your request again. If the problem persists, contact Amazon Web Services customer support.

Model.base: Information about a model deployed on an edge device that is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

refs.DeploymentModel$State: Returns the current state of the model.

refs.SendHeartbeatRequest$Models: Returns a list of models deployed on the the device.

refs.Definition$S3Url: The absolute S3 location of the model.

refs.DeploymentModel$StatusReason: Returns the error message for the deployment status result.
refs.DeploymentModel$RollbackFailureReason: Returns the error message if there is a rollback.

refs.DeploymentResult$DeploymentStartTime: The timestamp of when the deployment was started on the agent.
refs.DeploymentResult$DeploymentEndTime: The timestamp of when the deployment was ended, and the agent got the deployment results.
refs.EdgeMetric$Timestamp: Timestamp of when the metric was requested.
refs.Model$LatestSampleTime: The timestamp of the last data sample taken.
refs.Model$LatestInference: The timestamp of the last inference that was made.
